channel.title: Markdown on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Headers
item.description: Headers support The markdown # This is Header 1 ## This is Header 2 ### This is Header 3 #### This is Header 4 ##### This is Header 5 Rendered as follow This is Header 1 This is Header 2 This is Header 3 This is Header 4 This is Header 5 Customize To customize the headers, modify the static/css/style.css

item.title: Emphasis
item.description: Emphasis Emphasis by making text bold or italic. Bold To bold text, add two asterisks or underscores before and after a word or phrase. To bold the middle of a word for emphasis, add two asterisks without spaces around the letters. The markdown I just love **bold text**. I just love __bold text__. Rendered as bellow I just love bold text. I just love bold text. Bold Best Practices Markdown applications donâ€™t agree on how to handle underscores in the middle of a word.

item.title: Lists
item.description: Lists Organize items into ordered and unordered lists. Unordered Lists The markdown - Monday - Tuesday - Wednesday Rendered as follow Monday Tuesday Wednesday The markdown * Monday * Tuesday * Wednesday Rendered as follow Monday Tuesday Wednesday Ordered Lists The markdown 1. Monday 1. Tuesday 1. Wednesday Rendered as follow Monday Tuesday Wednesday Nested The markdown 1. Monday 1. Tuesday 1. Morning 1. Noon 1.

item.title: Blockquotes
item.description: Blockquotes The markdown This is a blockquotes > > This is a blockquotes > Rendered as follow This is a blockquotes Customize To customize the table, update the default setting of table, tr, th, td in static/css/style.css Default settings as below .main-article blockquote { display: block; margin-block-start: 1em; margin-block-end: 1em; margin-inline-start: 40px; margin-inline-end: 40px; border-left: 3px solid #E7E7E7; background: #fafafa; }

item.title: Table
item.description: Table Syntax and demo The markdown Working day | Reminder ---|--- Monday | Weekly meeting Tuesday | Documentation Wednesday | Coding Thusday | Debug and validation Friday | Release Rendered as follow Working day Reminder Monday Weekly meeting Tuesday Documentation Wednesday Coding Thusday Debug and validation Friday Release Customize To customize the table, change the default setting of table, tr, th, td in static/css/style.

item.title: Code Highlight
Link
item.description: Hyperlink The markdown [Get Started](/tutorials/get-started) Rendered as follow Get Started
